description: The upload destination contains information to start an upload of a file generated according to the underlying StorageLocationSetting.

concreteType.description: Indicates which implementation this object represents.

storageLocationId.description: the unique id for the storage location, that points to the StorageLocationSetting

banner.description: If set, the client should show this banner every time an upload is initiated

destinationProjectId.description: The ID of the project where this file will be uploaded.

projectStorageLocationUsage.description: This object includes information about size and limits associated with this project storage location.  Clients should not attempt to upload a file to this location if isOverLimit=true or if (<size_new_file> + sumFileBytes) is greater than maxAllowedFileBytes.
